meanings.definition: A person who snores loudly while sleeping.
meanings.sent1: My dad is one of the snorers in our family.
meanings.sent2: The snorers in the dormitory kept everyone awake at night.
meanings.sent3: The snorers at the sleepover sounded like a chorus of trumpets.
meanings.sent4: The snorers in the house were like a symphony of nighttime music.
meanings.sent5: The snorers in the cabin made it impossible to get a good night's sleep.

meanings.definition: Those who produce a harsh, snorting sound while sleeping.
meanings.sent1: The snorers in the movie theater were quite distracting.
meanings.sent2: I could hear the snorers in the next room through the thin walls.
meanings.sent3: The snorers in the library made studying almost impossible.
meanings.sent4: The snorers in the forest blended with the sounds of nature.
meanings.sent5: The snorers in the classroom made the lecture hard to follow.
